amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of Executive Order No. 13547 or to implement, administer, or enforce section 506.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to clarify that the National Ocean Policy is an important multiagency action that should be implemented.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A053) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A053) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Lowenthal.
